#labels Featured
=Configuration=

Configuration provided by xml config.
Default config placed inside scheme2ddl.jar. But you can provide option
{{{--config <path_to_your_custom_config>}}}

Sample config placed in distribution package.

==What can be configured==

|| name of config option ||  details ||
|| dataSource || ||
|| reader || ||
|| writer || || 
|| taskExecutor || 
|| transformParams_for_dbms_metadata || ||
|| ddlFormatter ||
|| dependencies ||
|| excludes ||
